experience.title: Actuarial Intern
responsibilities: Assisted senior actuaries with data validation and cleansing for quarterly valuation reports using Excel and SQL.
Performed sensitivity testing on various economic scenarios to support the pricing team in life insurance product development.
Automated routine data extraction processes, reducing manual processing time by approximately 10%.

experience.title: Mathematics Peer Tutor
responsibilities: Provided academic support to undergraduate students in Calculus III, Linear Algebra, and Probability Theory.
Developed custom study guides and practice problems for students preparing for the Society of Actuaries (SOA) Exam P.
Maintained a 95% student satisfaction rating based on department performance reviews.

metadata.experience_level: No prior experience in job field
